text: Kogelbergia is a genus of flowering plants in the family Stilbaceae described as a genus in 2000.Rourke, John Patrick. 2000. 30(1): 12-13Tropicos, Kogelbergia Rourke The entire genus is endemic to the Cape Province region of South Africa.Kew World Checklist of Selected Plant Families ;Species # Kogelbergia phylicoides (A.DC.) Rourke # Kogelbergia verticillata (Eckl. & Zeyh.) Rourke ==References== Category:Lamiales genera Category:Stilbaceae Category:Endemic flora of South Africa
title: Kogelbergia
